column1: 51 - Internat je stary - Ano nas internart nie je novy. ale nasa izba je pekna. a je tu tiez maly balkon aka je kuperlna? - Kupelna je nova ale kuchyna nie je moderna a nie je tu chladnicka - naozaj? - ale chladnicka je dolezita - to nie problem. pn vratnici je jeden inzerat - ty zuzana a tu pracka - tu nie ale myslim ze pracka je dole pri vratnici

I live in the city center. our house is big old and not modern and I live upstairs I live upstairs the elevator doesn't work my neighbor is old fat and his wife is very fat it's a comical couple their dog is very big. big and see my room is narrow and dark but what they have here is a bed a table a shelf and an old cupboard in the back is very wide _ and one flower in front is _ and _

column1: 59 - A co tvoje poladnice. Zuzanna? - Tati he z anglicka. There are typical English buses my friend works in London as an aupair and these two postcards are from Germany. there are cities in the middle and on the left in the back are the high Tatras - su tam pekne znamky stoja lens desaf korun? kolko stoji znamka do nemecka? = are there nice stamps saying lens desaf crowns? How much is a stamp to Germany?- znamky do nemecka nie su drahe. stoja dvadsafjeden korun = stamps to Germany are not expensive. they cost twenty-one crowns

column1: 60 - Hm. V Bratislave som prvykrat. Viem. ze je to hlavne mesto slovenska. ale ake je to mesto? - Male - Ano napriklad berlin alebo londyn su velke mesta a maju metra. v bratislave nie he metro. len autobusy. electricky. a trolejbusy. - Hm. a co je tu zaujimave? - Stare mesto. tak sa vola historicke centrum. su tam historicke budovy. kostoly. namestia a parky. bratislavske kaviarne su velmi oblubene. velmi pekny je dom svateho martina a bratislavsky hrad - a co kaviarne? su drahe? - ano v bratislave nie su kaviarne lacne. aj restauracie. hotely. divadlia a kina su drahe
column2: Hm. V Bratislave som prvykrat. Viem. ze je to hlavne mesto slovenska. ale ake je to mesto? = Hm. This is my first time in Bratislava. I know. that it is mainly a Slovak city. but what kind of city is it?- Male = small - Ano napriklad berlin alebo londyn su velke mesta a maju metra. v bratislave nie he metro. len autobusy. electricky. a trolejbusy. = Yes for example Berlin or London are big cities and have subways. there is no metro in Bratislava. only buses. electrically. and trolleybuses. - Hm. a co je tu zaujimave? = Um. and what is interesting here? - Stare mesto. tak sa vola historicke centrum. su tam historicke budovy. kostoly. namestia a parky. bratislavske kaviarne su velmi oblubene. velmi pekny je dom svateho martina a bratislavsky hrad Old town. that's the name of the historical center. there are historical buildings. churches. squares and parks. Bratislava cafes are very popular. the house of St. Martin and the Bratislava Castle are very nice a co kaviarne? su drahe? = what about the cafes? are they expensive - ano v bratislave nie su kaviarne lacne. aj restauracie. hotely. divadlia a kina su drahe =  yes cafes are not cheap in Bratislava. and restaurants. hotels. theaters and cinemas are expensive
